name: Archer VS Darkness - Evil Arrow Empire
name_original: Archer VS Darkness - Evil Arrow Empire
description:
“Cool Graphics”
“Nice Sound Effects”
“Smooth Animations”
___________________________________

Play the ultimate fun Archer vs. Darkness Game. This game can provide you that ultimate adventure game feeling. In this game, you have to attack the Halloween darkness using your bow and arrows. It is one of the top games for iPad and iOS.

Archer vs. Darkness Game is a complete action packed game. You're fighting with the Halloween darkness, making the best use of your archery. The complexity of the game play will increase with each level of the game. Collect your weapons, and get ready for the most exciting battle of your life. Enjoy!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Great Time Killer
Simple yet Addictive Game
Pumped up sound track
